评论概述: The Perfect Shirt For The Fall!
评论详情: Having tried various Coofandy clothing items in the past, I've come to expect a certain level of quality and uniqueness from them. This shirt is another awesome addition to their unique line of men's clothing. As a big fan of corduroy, I found this shirt quite appealing due to its design. Imagine a corduroy shirt, with the cords usually going in a vertical pattern. Now imagine that someone decided to also arrange the cords horizontally, creating a waffle-like pattern, and there's your shirt!  It's thick, but not oppressively so, and would be great as a "shacket" (shirt jacket, LOL), or as an extra layer (those in colder areas know what I mean, LOL).  Another great garment from Coofandy!
I've worn it out once since I received it and it looked great while giving me a little more protection from the winter chill...

评论概述: nice waffle pattern on a well made shacket
评论详情: This is a really nice shirt jacket. I didn't own a waffle-patterned shirt prior to this and wasn't sure how I'd like it, so I was glad to see that the pattern is subtle and tasteful and give the shirt some texture. The fit is pretty good. I got the medium and it fits my 6ft 180lb athletic frame pretty well, if a bit tight around the shoulders. The material as read on the tag is 100% polyester, which may bother some. I don't mind, as it's soft to my skin and washes well in the machine. It's currently a bit warm so I don't get the full utility out of this shirt jacket as I would if it were winter, as its thickness is enough to make me sweat when I'm outside in it. But that's good for the coming cold months. Overall, highly recommended.
When looking for an overshirt for fall and colder weather, this one checks all the boxes. It is stylish, it fits well, it gives some warmth, and the material is durable.

I recently purchased the COOFANDY Men's Button Down Waffle Shirt Jacket, and it quickly became one of my favorite go-to pieces! The lightweight fabric is perfect for layering in cooler weather without feeling bulky. It has a casual yet stylish look, making it versatile enough to wear out or just lounging around.  The waffle texture gives it a unique feel, and the fit is great—roomy but not too oversized. The buttons are solid, and the quality of the material seems really durable. Whether I'm throwing it over a T-shirt for a casual outing or wearing it on its own, it always looks sharp. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a stylish, comfortable, and practical shacket!

This waffle shirt is like wearing a stylish hug! The fabric is super soft, lightweight, and perfect for those "Is it jacket weather or not?" kind of days. The waffle pattern and chest pockets give it a cool, laid-back vibe, and it pairs with just about anything – jeans, casual pants, or even your favorite T-shirt. I've worn it to everything from hikes to casual hangouts, and it’s quickly become my go-to. Plus, it’s machine washable, so no extra fuss. If you want to look effortlessly stylish while staying comfy, this shirt’s your new best friend!

评论概述: Stylish and Versatile - A Lightweight Waffle Shirt Jacket for Casual Layering
评论详情: The COOFANDY Men's Button Down Waffle Shirt Jacket offers a perfect combination of style, comfort, and functionality. Designed as a lightweight shacket (shirt-jacket), this piece in olive green is ideal for layering during cooler seasons, making it a versatile addition to any wardrobe.  One of the standout features is the waffle-knit texture, which adds a subtle yet stylish element to the shirt jacket. The fabric is soft and breathable, ensuring comfort while still providing enough warmth for layering. The olive green color is both trendy and neutral, allowing it to pair effortlessly with various outfits, from casual jeans to chinos.  This shacket also boasts practical details like two flap pockets, which not only add to the casual look but are also functional for carrying small essentials. The button-down design gives you the flexibility to wear it open over a T-shirt for a relaxed vibe or buttoned up for a more polished look.  The medium size fits true to size, offering a comfortable and flattering fit. It’s perfect for those seeking a lightweight layer that adds style without bulk, making it suitable for everything from casual outings to relaxed work environments.  Overall, the COOFANDY Men’s Waffle Shirt Jacket is a stylish and practical choice for those who appreciate versatile clothing. Its lightweight construction, trendy waffle texture, and functional design make it perfect for layering during the fall or spring. Whether you're looking for a casual jacket or a comfortable overshirt, this shacket delivers both style and comfort.
smaller than advertised. a medium is actually a small.

My son really likes this shirt and I have seen him wear it as an overshirt several times. The price was very reasonable and the quality of the shirt was good. Nice material and looks to be well made. No complaints, I may buy another one for myself

评论概述: Stylish and versatile shacket; good texture and cut, but would have preferred cotton
评论详情: + Well-made, fashionable cut + Works well as a shacket for cooler weather + Can be buttoned down as a thick, waffle-textured shirt + A wealth of 16 colors to pick from  - Not clearly listed as polyester - Still got wrinkles and needs some ironing - Runs a bit large (for my medium size) but works as a shacket _____  This brand has steadily grown, and I’ve tried a variety of their products already. The quality seems consistent, and they maintain a standard level of manufacturing. This “shacket” (I learned the term recently and yes, I like saying that) works very nicely. It is thicker than a standard shirt, serving as a light jacket while still being fashionable. Even in summer, whether on cooler evenings or in a freezing subway car, it comes to the rescue while still giving a playful summery vibe. The texture is waffle, which gives it substance and helps it maintain shape. However, you still need to iron it; it is not exactly wrinkle-free.  My main issue with it is the fabric: it wasn’t clear in the listing, and I could only see on the tag that it is 100% polyester. I personally prefer cotton, as it is more breathable and natural, but since I will be wearing this more as an outer layer rather than something directly against my skin, I’m okay with that. (However, it was listed on Amazon under the category of “Cotton” in the breadcrumbs, which was not accurate). The disappointing thing is, for something synthetic, I hoped it would come wrinkle-free out of the washing machine and after hanging it to dry, but it didn’t; it had some wrinkles that could use some ironing.  Other than that, I like the overall cut. You can use it as an open shacket or buttoned down like a thick shirt, and it works well either way. I wear medium, and this was supposedly my size, but it was a bit larger than expected. If you are of a slim build, I wonder if small would work better for you. In all cases, double-check the measurements. As a shacket, though, the size works since I will always wear something underneath it.  It comes in 15 different colors, so you are bound to find one that fits within your wardrobe. The price is about average, maybe even above average, since the same brand also offers shackets made out of cotton for the same price (besides discounts), so go figure! (www.amazon.com/dp/B0D4XZRD6Z)  It is a good item for your wardrobe, but I would have preferred it to be cotton since I’m not getting the edge of the synthetic as being wrinkle-free. 4 stars from me!

I've ordered a few shirt/jackets in a natural color but they were always off color wise. This one is perfect, exactly as shown in the description photo.  The right size to use as a casual shirt or as an extra layer in cooler weather. A classic style that is always fashionable. Is well made with simple detailing. No shrinking after a machine wash and dry. It did require a hand steam to remove the packing creases.

评论概述: Inexpensive layering shirt, but you can tell it's polyester
评论详情: Inexpensive lightweight layering shirt with a bumpy 'waffle' texture, similar to the texture of thermal underwear but with a certain stiffness that belies 100% polyester construction.  Very little stretch and not very soft, but breathes well and provides some amount of moisture protection.  Large pockets and good construction overall.  Looks every bit the part of a traditional cotton flannel and will work just fine for layering.

I’ve ordered from COOFANDY before and found their shirts to run a bit large, so I sized down this time, and it fit perfectly. The waffle pattern, button closure, and stylish lapel design make it both fashionable and versatile. It’s great for various occasions, from casual outings to travel, and the quality fabric ensures comfort and durability.

This is a nice corduroy shirt that seems to be well-made. It is true to size, if not a little on the smaller side, as I normally wear a large, and this is a large and just a little tight in the shoulders for me (42 reg). If you like your shirts a little loose, order a size up. The stitching is clean and consistent. The small pin wale of this corduroy looks very nice, but I found it very warm to wear because it is 100% polyester. Just a little cotton in this fabric would have made it much more comfortable to wear in warmer climates, but even wearing it indoors in an air-conditioned house was warm. I'll put this to the back of my closet until winter :-).
